title: Learning to use Vercel AI SDK for beginners using NextJS
description: This course is designed for beginners who want to learn how to use the Vercel AI SDK with Next.js.
No prior experience with Vercel AI SDK or Next.js is required, but a basic understanding of JavaScript and web development concepts will be helpful.

chapters.title: Introduction to Vercel AI SDK and Next.js

sections.title: Overview of Vercel AI SDK
sections.content: An introduction to the features and capabilities of the Vercel AI SDK, including its integration with various machine learning APIs.

sections.title: Getting Started with Next.js
sections.content: A brief overview of Next.js, a popular JavaScript framework for building server-side rendered applications.

chapters.title: Setting up a Next.js Project with Vercel AI SDK

sections.title: Creating a New Next.js Application
sections.content: Step-by-step instructions on how to create and initialize a new Next.js project from scratch.

sections.title: Installing the Vercel AI SDK
sections.content: Detailed guide on installing the Vercel AI SDK in your Next.js application, including any necessary dependencies.

chapters.title: Integrating Cohere API with Vercel AI SDK in Next.js

sections.title: Using the Cohere API with Vercel AI SDK
sections.content: Instructions on integrating the Cohere API into a Next.js application using the Vercel AI SDK, including code examples.

sections.title: Next Steps for Further Learning
sections.content: Suggestions for additional resources and projects to continue learning about Vercel AI SDK and Next.js.
